casebody.data:
BURGESS
v.
EBAY, INC., et al. No. 69P13-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 17, 2016. Albert C. Burgess, Jr., Butner, for Burgess, Albert C. (Jr.). The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th of January 2016 by Plaintiff to Proceed In Forma Pauperis: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of March 2016." ERVIN, J. recused.
